elements.2211.03279_e73896ef2a29821158e28553bb6fa: Vocal entrainment is a social adaptation mechanism in human interaction, knowledge of which can offer useful insights to an individual's cognitive-behavioral characteristics.
elements.2211.03279_948d6d8516d042258dc5359ad96c1: We propose a context-aware approach for measuring vocal entrainment in dyadic conversations
elements.2211.03279_ffb308800bb6da5403aabf64b2d6d: (a combination of convolutional network and transformer) for capturing both short-term and long-term conversational context to model entrainment patterns in interactions across different domains
elements.2211.03279_a35c9f7933cd823ce11780aa169c0: Specifically we use cross-subject attention layers to learn intra- as well as interpersonal signals from dyadic conversations
elements.2211.03279_256a8e33e915f6513e502865335e7: We first validate the proposed method based on classification experiments to distinguish between
elements.2211.03279_28a2434f2f10f679b7bd06c91e8bd: Experimental results on interactions involving individuals with Autism Spectrum Disorder also show evidence of a statistically-significant association between the introduced entrainment measure and clinical scores relevant to symptoms, including across gender and age groups.
elements.2211.03279_bf0b764a2ad12a148b4fb6c21caff: Interpersonal human interactions, notably dyadic interactions
elements.2211.03279_94f5800d7891dfd6cca447b4e69da: (interactions involving two people), are widely studied by social science and human-centered computing researchers alike
elements.2211.03279_14a01f97e229fc4e1535b23d12077: Such interactions are characterized by rich information exchange across multiple modalities including speech, language, and visual cues
elements.2211.03279_e40be2cb7a8dff7a3de43c858c539: Over the years, a significant amount of effort has been invested in developing tools for both conversational data collection and in understanding and modeling the signals extracted from these interactions.
elements.2211.03279_a427dd83ae3ae5a6d3da74b7393f3: has been described as one of the major driving forces of an interaction
elements.2211.03279_ca9cf88023c6c0338dd347196556b: While entrainment can be exhibited within and across different modalities, vocal entrainment
elements.2211.03279_b48bc20f2560d9ca73b68f89e454e: is defined as an interlocutor's tendency to accommodate or adapt to the vocal patterns of the other interlocutor over the course of the interaction.
elements.2211.03279_44a8c74abc12bb5c7ab0bac40d720: can provide meaningful insights to analyze behavioral characteristics of the individual interlocutors and the interaction participants
elements.2211.03279_1bc62e1ded1032eddebc90793774b: For example, a higher degree of entrainment is associated with positive behavioral markers like social desirability, smoother interactions, higher rapport content
elements.2211.03279_dd21c7d760959a4caaf2a1dc7b2cf: Entrainment can also serve as a valuable instrument to characterize behaviors in the study and practice of psychiatry and developmental studies involving distressed couples, children with autism spectrum disorder, addiction,
elements.2211.03279_b4d390fd01f442e45200815e379a1: Due to the complex nature of entrainment and a scarcity of appropriately labeled speech corpora, quantifying entrainment is a challenging task
elements.2211.03279_5aad64619ffec9cc244ab324b02ca: Most of the early works have relied on empirical and knowledge-driven tools like correlation, recurrence analysis, time-series analysis, spectral methods to measure how much a speaker is entraining to the other speaker
elements.2211.03279_a157bdd04cb1869090374784eab7a: This body of work often relied on the assumption of a linear relationship between the extracted entrainment representations and vocal features, which may not always hold
elements.2211.03279_1a94689551e5c91f04d141ed129e8: On the other hand, although context during a conversation plays an important part in interpersonal interactions, it has not been incorporated in existing approaches for measuring entrainment
elements.2211.03279_991d158d620c1df51d332d9516273: While the recent line of works
elements.2211.03279_996df76b580c94a20b3e5b0ff962e: employ a more direct data-driven strategy to extract entrainment related information from raw speech features, such are formulated in a way that they inherently only consider short-term context while overlooking more long-term context.
elements.2211.03279_04698056552d9260d72be73a8918d: Recently context-aware deep learning architectures such as transformers
elements.2211.03279_38aca04ada69968a33898e4a18178: have been proposed to capture richer contexts by explicitly modeling the temporal dimension and found many applications in natural language processing, speech and vision.
elements.2211.03279_0f19c605eb79eae61ac91f0ed6faf: In light of their success in modeling rich temporal context, we investigate if transformers can help capture meaningful information for quantifying entrainment.
elements.2211.03279_adb597ec3729f4bdac261499702d0: In this work, we develop a context-aware model for computing entrainment, addressing the need for both short and long-range temporal context modeling
elements.2211.03279_505fca27b3192d6a531c054817062: For the scope of this work, the proposed framework incorporates `context' by aiming to train the model to learn the influence of the speakers on each other
elements.2211.03279_568225b30f21529812131a86048de: We follow the established strategy of using a distance-based measure between consecutive turn-pairs in the projected embedding space and introduce the
elements.2211.03279_0b85470a509cd431fb37675671498: The main contributions of this work are two fold: first, we use a combination of self-attention and convolution to extract both short-term and long-term contextual information related to entrainment; and second, we propose a transformer-based cross-subject framework for joint modeling of the interacting speakers to learn the pattern of entrainment
elements.2211.03279_b8b5c93c5c448ed53174f0df7c2ac: We experimentally evaluate the validity and efficacy of CED in dyadic conversations involving children and study its association with respect to different clinically-significant behavioral ratings where the role of entrainment has been previously implicated
elements.2211.03279_4a0e757b51ba8eb6fbb729de91031: Unsupervised model training and CED computation
elements.2211.03279_915d4fdd686d0643f686e0b654469: Prior literature in this domain have relied on computing a distance measure directly between the turn-level speech features
elements.2211.03279_187cfb8b6e0f5ccfeeff5ca467c69: However, these features also capture additional information such as speaker characteristics and ambient acoustic information which do not contribute towards learning the target entrainment patterns
elements.2211.03279_02dbcc73274d0867ea8d579f8d7b0: The objective is to learn the inverse mapping between the embedding space
elements.2211.03279_8784affb0054f870f097dec36f9d8: ) such that the model should learn to recognize turn pairs with high and low levels of entrainment
elements.2211.03279_302d30dc56799c1c185dcd62c066c: Here, we formulate the problem by training the network to classify between interactions having consecutive turn segments
elements.2211.03279_33fefd07aba5be9243667d66c28a6: and interactions having random/shuffled turn segments
elements.2211.03279_b460730791423b1db29fbea4ad628: We temporally partition the conversational audio sequence into speaker specific chunks and feed these chunks to the model to predict whether the fed audio chunks are part of real conversation or a fake one
elements.2211.03279_222ebc5e96357c256ccf2a4b29f1a: After the training phase, we use the trained network weights to extract the cross-encoder layer outputs for both speakers
elements.2211.03279_21de7e060e666109ceb2049007660: Next, we calculate CED as the smooth L1 distance
elements.2211.03279_83ba2f1379be7861e5c19d1b989c6: between the embeddings obtained in the previous step.
elements.2211.03279_96c1a73a2b29d9c8ca7f17f5ae4c5: , we use two main modules to build the model to compute entrainment, first, the self-attention encoder that is used to enhance the extracted features by attending to themselves and then, a cross-attention encoder which allows the features to attend to a different source
elements.2211.03279_df9820f3c7f1489363b182717b31e: layers for the self-attention module to model both short-term and long-term dependencies within an audio sequence in a parameter-efficient way by incorporating a convolutional module in the transformer layer
elements.2211.03279_1199ce10f06c7f880c97c271f7d93: The self-attention layer obtains meaningful representation from the long-term interaction and the convolution layer is used to learn the local relation amongst the interaction based features
elements.2211.03279_2e5e5a941d350003ede74d43990a4: To extract meaningful information related to entrainment, previous works have mostly relied on individual modeling of interlocutors involved in a conversation
elements.2211.03279_8a7a01872abaddfab3fa2aea37a90: However, entrainment being an interpersonal phenomenon, the need for jointly modeling interlocutors becomes heightened in such scenarios
elements.2211.03279_d7390b710b31dd7554a0cf2345f7b: We address this issue by using a transformer layer for cross-subject attention, allowing the features extracted per subject to access each other to capture crossed influence over the interaction.
elements.2211.03279_162290ecb8b8b32700ab5595f95dc: We use the following two datasets for our experiments.

elements.2211.03279_e67e3613aa86ed0298bb6d9be4c1c: In this work we introduce a novel context-aware approach (CED) to measure vocal entrainment in dyadic conversations
elements.2211.03279_e2200c98cfee08255fe1b72e542b2: We use a combination of convolutional neural networks and transformers to capture both short-term and long-term context, and also employ a cross-subject attention module to learn interpersonal entrainment related information from the other subject in a dyadic conversation
elements.2211.03279_d50db58f000f4bb5ab4f971bf3775: We validate the use of CED as a proxy metric for measuring entrainment by conducting a classification experiment to distinguish between
elements.2211.03279_4ac242e0fe90a09aff7a927fda1d9: We also study the association between CED and clinically relevant scores related to ASD symptoms by computing the correlation metric
elements.2211.03279_39c7c4618e880ea7af7a472cd705b: We also report the mean absolute value of directional CED across gender and different age-groups to understand if the entrainment pattern of the children varies across gender or age-group or not
elements.2211.03279_f9881c92d2f45a949952ba0c24629: In this work, we use a self-supervised embedding for feature extraction, it will be interesting to see if other context-based pre-trained embeddings yeild similar performance in capturing entrainment
elements.2211.03279_741ac4fd237f16e5df483f12f207c: We also face difficulties in deploying entrainment embeddings learnt on Fisher for ADOSMod3 dataset and thus we plan to investigate domain-specific entrainment embeddings for understanding behavioral traits.
